Agents/Platforms:
pixeljuice

| Access Log | Access Details Report | Referring URLs Report | Keywords Report |

These reports list the agents (browsers) and platforms (operating systems) utilized by visitors to these pages. Browsers which "spoof" other browsers are identified as what they really are, rather than as what they claim to be. The "Spider/Robot" category includes such things as automated link checkers, search engine spiders and offline information agents. "E-Mail Harvesters" are robots which search a site with the specific purpose of collecting e-mail addresses.

The first report details the agents utilized; the second, the platforms. The third report combines the data from the first two. The fourth report is a complete and essentially unprocessed listing of the raw data from the agent log.

A total of 5,400 "hits" have thus far been recorded and analyzed.
